website_summaries.verdict: This kitchen sink folds up into a compact case.
pros: A complete kitchen set up for pretend play
Clasps together and contains all pieces
Has all the pretend kitchen elements including a sink for washing
Can take kitchen play on the go
cons: A very small set for very young children

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for the price and easy for traveling and small play areas.
customer_reviews.text: There was a bit more assembly than I anticipated, but my 4 year old likes it. Once it’s together it’s easy to pull out, play and put back without a huge kitchen set taking up valuable space in the play room. My biggest problems are the FSU eat and handles on the sides of the stove too. They aren’t easy to remove when packing up and I need to help him put them on and take off each time.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: First, couldn't find directions in box but went by picture on box and online to make sure I had it right. The holding bar for lapels to hang, pops off on one side. The grill that places in case doesn't snap in place so is easily moved by little one. Be careful when applying stickers, you only get one shot, they don't uplift if needed to smooth out. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for child!
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute! This is the best gift for a child. My child likes it very much.It's made of plastic. It's of good quality. It feels light to hold and won't break. It's also easy to use and tidy up when you're not playing.
customer_reviews.author: Weng

customer_reviews.title: There is a good selection of common tools and the nuts and bolts ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 year old son who loves tools (real tools) which I work with at my garage. I bought him this set and he adores this and plays with them a lot more than any of the other toys that he has. There is a good selection of common tools and the nuts and bolts are great to play with. If you have a child who is curious about tools that you work with, this is a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: meena pomasa

customer_reviews.title: It would be a great toy to take out to play because everything is self contained.
customer_reviews.text: The kitchen comes equipped with pans, lids, plates, utensils, food etc. all these pieces store nicely in the unit.It is an entire little kitchen set enclosed in a stepstool. There is nothing that is difficult to assemble, just a few pieces to be inserted. Once the top is opened it reveals a removable cooktop. It would be a great toy to keep or bring to a relatives' house because everything is self contained.
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this to entertain a friends 2 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to entertain a friends 2 year old that is visiting her brother in the hospital on the weekends. It was a bit smaller than I had expected and I am not sure how long the plastics clasp that keep it closed will last for. I will check with them and see if she has used it and if she likes it. If it is a big hit I will increase my stars.
customer_reviews.author: H. OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and have to take apart for it to be portable
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this was because I thought it would be portable. It’s only portable if you take it all apart and put it back together. The toys are cheap plastic. Not worth $17.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Ok toy
customer_reviews.text: Ok product. Kiddos can take apart in seconds. Probably won’t last long but for the price ok.
customer_reviews.author: Trish C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size. It fits the toy kitchen bill withput taking up half a room!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old and 4 year old love this! It is super small
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old and 4 year old love this! It is super small, but that's the best part is they can take it anywhere and play! I got a ton of compliments too on how cute it is
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good toys just need a table for them to be on.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: tips over easily. However
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy; tips over easily. However, does pack up for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L. Eldred

product_meta.title: Life-Tandy Early Development Child Kitchen Pretend Play Toys Many Optional Role-Playing Toddlers Boys Girls for 26PCS
product_meta.description:
**Miniature Portable Stove Top with all the tools and utensils you need
**2Includes kitchen tools, utensils, cups, dishes, mugs, pots, pans, and more
**Easy Self Assembly
**Size: 24 H x 22cm W x 10cm D
feature_bullets: The wonderfully realistic Kitchen set puts your little chef right in the heart of the home!
This Kitchen Play Set will encourage role playing and is great for developing hand/eye coordination.
The play set will bring out the Cook in any child. It is easy to assemble and with lots of little tasks to do, it is sure to keep them busy for many hours of cooking fun!
The Kitchen has a hob and comes with loads of accessories such as a kitchen sink, pot, pan, cutlery and more for realistic play!
This brightly colored Kitchen is perfect for mini-sized cook and junior chef with a passion for cookery!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars26 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
